name: White Wolf Witches
description:
White Wolf Witches is a game about a Witcher finding his way in a world full of beautiful women.

Please enjoy our game. If you would like to support us, influence future updates, and get a little bonus content, please look for our patreon here:

https://www.patreon.com/Pieinthesky

https://subscribestar.adult/emmeraldentertainment

If you experience any bugs, be sure to check out the offline version on our patreon above. This is generally a lot more stable - and smoother.

We also have a discord.

https://linktr.ee/emmerald.ent
